metadata.Title: CVE-2013-1434 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Multiple SQL injection vulnerabilities in (1) api_poller.php and (2) utility.php in Cacti before 0.8.8b allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary SQL commands via unspecified vectors.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-1434` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

cacti - 0.8.8b+dfsg-5
No subscription required

criterions.comment: cacti package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.8.8b+dfsg-5').
